thread.title: BRIEF-Sun Hydraulics Reports Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.27

title: BRIEF-Sun Hydraulics Reports Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.27
text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Sun Hydraulics Corp:
* SUN HYDRAULICS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.27
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.10 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $370 MILLION TO $385 MILLION * QTRLY NET SALES $84.2 MILLION VERSUS $49.9 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.27, REVENUE VIEW $82.5 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $391.7 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
